body.name: Pampers Baby Wipes Sensitive 1X, 56 Count
features: Wipes for sensitive skin, with Softgrip Texture.
body.description: Product Description Sensitive wipes with unique Softgrip TextureÂ® texture provide a more gentle cleaning. They are clinically proven mild, for sensitive baby skin. Wipes are dermatologist-tested, hypoallergenic, and perfume-free, which helps make changing time even better. PampersÂ® Sensitive wipes are 20% thicker than PampersÂ® regular wipes, for a more pleasant experience. From the Manufacturer Less wiping for more gentle cleaning view largerChanging your baby can be one of the most loving moments of the day. With Pampers Sensitive wipes’ unique Softgrip Texture, your baby will enjoy less wiping for more gentle cleaning.They are clinically proven, dermatologist-tested, hypoallergenic, and perfume-free, which helps make changing time even better.Plus, Pampers Sensitive wipes are 20% thicker than our regular wipes. During changing time, give your baby our best gentle clean: Pampers Sensitive wipes.Pampers RewardsGet rewarded for buying Pampers!Collect Pampers Rewards points for every Pampers purchase you make. Then redeem your points for fun rewards at Pampers.com.At a GlanceThe #1 choice wipe of hospitals based on sales dataLess wiping for more gentle cleaning20% thicker than regular Pampers wipes view largerLess Wiping for More Gentle CleaningThe unique Softgrip Texture gently cleans more with less wiping view largerThick Enough to Handle Changing Time20% thicker than other Pampers wipes to help gently clean your baby’s skin view largerHelps Restore Baby's Natural Skin BalanceHypoallergenic and perfume free view largerGentle Enough for Baby's Hands and FaceClinically proven mild and dermatologist testedAlso Try view largerPampers best protection and fit, Pampers Cruisers. Available in sizes 3, 4, 5, 6, and 7.Frequently Asked QuestionsWhat should I know about wiping my baby?All Pampers baby wipes help clean away bacteria, even after a wet change. Have a supply handy while changing diapers to help keep your baby clean and fresh.For baby girls, while changing diapers, always wipe from front to back to minimize the amount of stool material that gets near her genitals. Also, be careful to clean all areas, as the folds in the skin around her genitals can hide urine and soil.How can I treat and prevent diaper rash?Red bumps on your baby's bottom may mean diaper rash. It can be caused by many factors, including leaving urine or bowel movement on the skin too long between changing diapers or even as a result of taking antibiotics. And when your baby starts solid foods, wait a few days between introducing each new food to see if the rash was caused by a particular food.If your baby has diaper rash, clean the entire diapered area gently but thoroughly with a baby wipe. It is also helpful to allow air to reach the skin. Talk to your pediatrician or pharmacist if the rash does not improve.Goes Great With... view largerPampers Swaddlers Sensitive diapers. Wrap your baby’s delicate skin in our best comfort and protection. Now with umbilical cord notch.Product Comparison Pampers Sensitive Wipes Pampers Baby Fresh Wipes Pampers Natural Clean Wipes OUR BEST WIPE:20% thicker versus regular Pampers wipesThe #1 choice of U.S. hospitals based on sales dataClinically proven mildPerfume-free 2X stronger than Huggies Natural Care wipesRefreshing scentLotion with pure water in every wipe 2X stronger than Huggies Natural Care wipesUnscentedLotion with a touch of aloe in every wipe Softgrip Texture ✓ ✓ ✓ Hypoallergenic ✓ ✓ ✓

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #18,737 in Baby (See Top 100 in Baby) #158 in Diaper Wipes & Refills

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 1, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Durable and i live that there isn't a scent
reviews.reviewText: Pampers sensitive wipes are fantastic. Not only do I use them to clean my children, but they are durable enough to clean spots off carpets, in cars, on surfaces, and even wood! The travel packs are perfect to keep in my purse and car, so I always have them available. I love that there isn't any smell to these and in a weird but pleasant way, they always seem to stay cool. Which is nice in the summer Whalen wiping off hands and faces at the pool.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Product great, but return process not
reviews.reviewText: Like the product, however, when a duplicate order was made and received I learned that this product is non-returnable. There is also no reimbursement for unusable items. Be care about ordering the correct size.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2015
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The travel pack is nice for putting in the diaper bag
reviews.reviewText: My infant daughter has sensitive skin and it wasn't working to use regular wipes. I first switch over the WaterWipes as I had those on hand. The cost is a bit more than I wanted to pay so I looked into getting Pampers Sensitive Wipes. The price per wipe is much more reasonable. I tested them out on my daughter and she responded well to the wipes. The travel pack is nice for putting in the diaper bag. As of now, we plan on using Pampers Sensitives wipes for our diapering needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Like the re-closable top, and these are nice thick wipes.
reviews.reviewText: These are my go-to wipes. They work well, and i like that the top of them are re-closable. My kids also don't have any issue with the fragrance. I have used these on my kids since they were new-borns.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 28, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Just tubes - no shaped foot.
reviews.reviewText: Don't be misled by the image - these tights don't have 'feet.' They are just tubes with a seam at the toe and it drives my girl crazy when she puts on shoes. Check out Jeffries, which are shaped as a foot.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2014
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars This is the worst buy I have ever made
reviews.reviewText: This is the worst buy I have ever made!! love the wipes, but how can a pack of 56 wipes cost 11,27 usd??? when I can go anywhere and find them for 3.. This is just ridiculous, Im returning them immediately.. Somehow I didn't notice it was only one pack!! What a scam.. very disappointed

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 23, 2019
Reviewed in the United States on June 9, 2015
reviews.reviewText: These are great all purpose wipes to keep handy. I love that the container has its own cover instead of just a sticker to keep it shut. I leave these in the car to have as hand wipes and for anything else that is needed.

There is no 2nd thought about which diaper/ wipes to buy dor your baby. It is always Pampers for my little one. No wonder they are the best in market. No complaint about the wipes. 4 stars because of the fragrance.
